derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (as a noun): from Anglo-Latin incumbens, incumbent-, from Latin incumbere 'lie or lean on', from in- 'upon' + a verb related to cubare 'lie'

entry.def: An incumbent is someone who holds an official post at a particular time.

example.ex: In general, incumbents have a 94 per cent chance of being reelected.
example.tran: 通常现任官员有 94% 的几率会再次当选。

entry.tran: 成为责任的;义不容辞的;必须履行的
entry.def: If it is incumbent upon you to do something, it is your duty or responsibility to do it.

example.ex: It is incumbent upon all of us to make an extra effort.
example.tran: 我们所有人都必须加倍努力。

means.word_mean: 1. the official who holds an office
1. lying or leaning on something else;

auth_sentence.content: His main rival is the incumbent President Mahinda Rajapaksa.
auth_sentence.res_content: His main rival is the incumbent President Mahinda Rajapaksa.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His main rival is the incumbent President Mahinda Rajapaksa.

auth_sentence.content: The term of incumbent President Jacques Chirac expires in May.
auth_sentence.res_content: The term of incumbent President Jacques Chirac expires in May.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The term of incumbent President Jacques Chirac expires in May.

auth_sentence.content: Incumbent Bashir is re-elected for further five years.
auth_sentence.res_content: Incumbent Bashir is re-elected for further five years.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Incumbent Bashir is re-elected for further five years.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =lie down,表示"躺"; 2. =barrier,表示躺的"东西,障碍"

stems_affixes.word_buile: ac加强+cumb躺+ent……的→adj.横卧的,斜靠的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 职责所在的,负有……义务的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in内+cumb躺+ent……的→在某[职位]躺着→任某种职位
encumber[v.妨害,阻碍]+ance表名词→encumbrance妨碍物
in内+cumb躺+ency表名词→在某[职位]躺着→职责
suc下面+cumb躺→躺下去→屈从;死亡

sentences.en: He defeated the incumbent governor by a large plurality.
sentences.cn: 他以压倒多数票击败了现任州长。

sentences.en: It is incumbent upon us to do so.
sentences.cn: 这样做是我们义不容辞的责任。

sentences.en: The old man is an incumbent.
sentences.cn: 那位老人是一位教区牧师。

jushi.english: Bush is the incumbent president of the United States.
It is incumbent upon us to do so.
jushi.chinese: 这样做是我们义不容辞的责任。

jushi.english: It is incumbent on you to provide for your parents.
jushi.chinese: 供养父母是你应尽的义务。
